lines.text: Remove them! It's a bridge, for god's sake; not a petting zoo!
Now, feel free to jump in if I get any of this wrong, but you haven't got the disc, and you haven't got the girl...
... Pity. I was so hoping you'd jump in.
Guess what we're going to blow up first!
No, but nice try, sailor! The Eiffel Tower!
Because it's big and it's beautiful and I'm tired of looking at it!
Stupid bee! You're just a fly with a stinger on your arse!
You gagged her with a POTATO?
I tried grapes but she kept eating them!
